THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail depicts Harry and Meghan physically separated from their supposed 'allies' (three other people), which visually supports the title's claim of them being isolated and Harry only having Meghan as his ally. The triggered use of 'DUMPED BY ALLIES' further underscores the narrative of social abandonment following a controversy.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: The title specifically references a 'disastrous BBC interview,' but the thumbnail does not visually reference the interview or the BBC.
